main event: Several unidentified flying objects were reported over Walnut and Memphis, Tennessee on 7 April 1952, observed moving rapidly and described as bright and fiery.
interesting points: The objects were observed by multiple witnesses including GID agents and civilians., The sightings spanned locations in Walnut and Memphis, Miss., The objects were described as brighter than aircraft beacons., Witnesses reported feeling as if the objects would crash, but they eventually disappeared from view., The reports indicated that there were possibly multiple similar sightings reported in the area at the same time.
sighted object: bright light and unidentified flying objects
witness description: Including GID agents and civilians, with a specific report from a GID agent and their daughter.
